summary: Implements a custom parser for Python package dependency specifications. It tokenizes requirement strings, builds an abstract syntax tree using generic node, operation, value, and variable objects, and offers helper routines to interpret markers, extras, version constraints, and overall requirement definitions.
business_intent: Allow packaging and distribution tools to reliably parse, validate, and serialize dependency declarations—including version ranges, optional extras, and environment markers—so they can be processed programmatically during package installation or metadata generation.
